00165 
00166     This function is called at IPI_LEVEL to process any outstanding
00167     interprocess request for the current processor.
00168 
00169 Arguments:
00170 
00171     TrapFrame - Supplies a pointer to a trap frame.
00172 
00173     ExceptionFrame - Supplies a pointer to an exception frame
00174 
00175 Return Value:
00176 
00177     A value of TRUE is returned, if one of more requests were service.
00178     Otherwise, FALSE is returned.
00179 
00180 --*/
00181 
00182 {
00183 
00184     ULONG RequestSummary;
00185 
00186     //
00187     // Process any outstanding interprocessor requests.
00188     //
00189 
00190     RequestSummary = KiIpiProcessRequests();
00191 
00192     //
00193     // If freeze is requested, then freeze target execution.
00194     //
00195 
00196     if ((RequestSummary & IPI_FREEZE) != 0) {
00197         KiFreezeTargetExecution(TrapFrame, ExceptionFrame);
00198     }
00199 
00200     //
00201     // Return whether any requests were processed.
00202     //
00203 
00204     return (RequestSummary & ~IPI_FREEZE) != 0;
00205 }
